class.name: AudioStreamPlayer
class.description: Plays an audio stream non-positionally. To play audio positionally, use [AudioStreamPlayer2D] or [AudioStreamPlayer3D] instead of [AudioStreamPlayer].

method.name: get_playback_position
method.description: Returns the position in the [AudioStream] in seconds.

method.name: get_stream_playback
method.description: Returns the [AudioStreamPlayback] object associated with this [AudioStreamPlayer].

method.name: play
method.description: Plays the audio from the given [code]from_position[/code], in seconds.

method.name: seek
method.description: Sets the position from which audio will be played, in seconds.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], audio plays when added to scene tree.
Bus on which this audio is playing.
If the audio configuration has more than two speakers, this sets the target channels. See [enum MixTarget] constants.
The pitch and the tempo of the audio, as a multiplier of the audio sample's sample rate.
If [code]true[/code], the playback is paused. You can resume it by setting [code]stream_paused[/code] to [code]false[/code].

signal.name: finished
signal.description: Emitted when the audio stops playing.

constants.constant: The audio will be played only on the first channel.
The audio will be played on all surround channels.
The audio will be played on the second channel, which is usually the center.
